sentences.sContent: Here, crew safety and kit preservation are the watchwords.
sentences.sContent_eng: Here, crew safety and kit preservation are the watchwords.
sentences.sCn: 在这里，船员安全和装备的维护是常用口令。

sentences.sContent: And security researchers have found ways of hacking into some kinds ofmedical devices and cars, though this still requires specialist knowledge and kit.
sentences.sContent_eng: And security researchers have found ways of hacking into some kinds ofmedical devices and cars, though this still requires specialist knowledge and kit.
sentences.sCn: 尽管需要专业的知识和装备，安全研究人员仍发现一些侵入某些医疗设备和汽车的方法。

phrases.pCn: 酶联免疫试剂盒（Enzyme Linked Immunosorbent Assay Kit）

trans.tranCn: 成套工具； 配套元件
trans.tranOther: a set of tools, equipment etc that you use for a particular purpose or activity
